title: Rob the Robot
overview: Rocking robots, bouncing spacebugs and blazing comets… tighten your bolts and buckle your seat belts for the exciting adventures of Rob the Robot! Join Rob – the galaxy's most curious and adventurous robot – as he explores the boundless galaxy one planet at a time with his friends Ema – the alien linguist, TK – the wheeling toolkit, and Orbit – the quirky artist, solving problems, making amazing discoveries and of course having crazy fun along the way!
